attributes.action: stop Israel from destroying Palestinian homes and buildings in East Jeruselem
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ever since Israel occupied Palestinain lands (including Gaza and West Bank), Israel has never ever stopped terrifying Palestinains and forcing them to leave their homes. The Palestinains now live on less than 22& of their land and they live unmercifully. The world leaders must stand with the Palestinians and stop Isael from harming them. Palestinains are being banned from having an independent state and the capital is Jeruselem

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
